00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031   createinfo(argc, argv);

00033   // enough arguments ?
00034 
00035   if (argc < 2) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00037             "\n     -j J            2j of state"
00038             "\n     -p +1|-1        parity of state"
00039             "\n     -a INDEX        index of state"
00040             "\n     -r RMAX         calculate to max separation"

00060     switch (c) {
00061     case 'j':
00062       j = atoi(optarg);
00063       break;
00064     case 'p':
00065       pi = (atoi(optarg) == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00066       break;
00067     case 'a':

00069       break;

00072       break;
00073     case 'n':

00087 
00088   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n)) {
00089     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read %s\n", mcstatefile);
00090     exit(-1);
00091   }
00092 
00093   TBDensRPara TBDP = {
00094     rmax : rmax,
00095     npoints : npoints
00096   };
00097 
00098   int a,b;
00099 
00100   // J or Pi unset
00101   if (j == -1) j = (Q[0].A % 2 ? 1 : 0);
00102   if (pi == -1) pi = (Q[0].A % 2 ? 1 : 0); 
00103 
00104   fprintf(stderr, "J: %d, Pi: %c1, alpha: %d\n", j, pi ? '-' : '+', alpha);
00105

00110   void* tbdensme[n*n];
00111

00113 
00114   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00115     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {

00117 
00118       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P,
00119                                     &OpTwoBodyDensityR, S[a], S[b],

00125                                  tbdensme[a+b*n]);

00127     }
00128

00130     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpTwoBodyDensityR, tbdensme, n);
00131   }
00132
